column4: hello, my son is 5 and i'm setting his computer up.  so far so good except for the fact that it won't let me pick simple passwords like fish bird, etc.  how can i change that?
why don't you make it auto-login?
i use that as a tool to help him spell.  i change his password every week in a while and he has to learn to spell a new word
heh, that's cute.  I'll have to remember that.
